metadata.description: Harry Waters was just a lovable jerk until the fateful day he stumbled upon a futuristic stealth suit and a centuries-old war between the Illuminati and a fledgling resistance. Aided by the mighty Richard Nixon, Harry will discover that the Illuminati have their hands in the assassination of JFK, a cataclysmic earthquake that turns Los Angeles into a raging island nation, and even the mysterious disappearance of Harry's father. How deep does the conspiracy go? Find out in The Black List!
metadata.name: The Black List
